entries.title: Taiwan to extend compulsory military service citing threats from China
entries.description: Taiwan will extend its compulsory military service from four-months to one year starting in 2024, President Tsai Ing-wen announced, citing rising threats from China over the self-ruled island. The longer military service applies to men born after 2005 and will start on January 1, 2024.

entries.title: Three servicemen killed after drone shot down at Russian airbase
entries.description: Russia said that three of its airmen were killed when a Ukrainian drone was shot down near a strategic bomber base inside Russia. Ukraine has not publicly claimed responsibility.

entries.title: Seoul residents express concern over North Korean drones entering South Korea
entries.description: Residents of South Korea’s capital Seoul expressed concern over incursions by North Korean drones that crossed into the South's airspace. South Korea responded by scrambling fighter jets and attack helicopters in an effort to shoot the drones down.

entries.title: Taiwan to extend military conscription to one year, citing threat from China
entries.description: Taiwan will extend compulsory military service to one year from four months starting in 2024 due to the rising threat the self-ruling island faces from China.

entries.title: Kim Jong Un claims North Korean success as key political meeting begins
entries.description: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un called for stronger effort to overcome hardships and challenges facing his country as he opened a key political meeting.

entries.title: South Korea lifts ban on imported sex dolls
entries.description: South Korea has formally lifted a ban on the import of full-body sex dolls, ending years of debate over how much the government can interfere in private life.
